participant_1.name: Alex Green
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and inquisitive, with a passion for collecting and organic living.
participant_1.background: I only eat organic food. I have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures. I collect comic books. I am allergic to dust.

participant_2.name: Jordan Blake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, with a flair for storytelling and a love of languages.
participant_2.background: I was the first test child for sesame street. I once started a forest fire in california. I speak six languages. I always carry an edged weapon. I work on the radio as a character voice.

content.text: Hi there! I'm participant_1, and I have some interesting things about me. First, I only eat organic food. Second, I have an autograph collection with over 2000 signatures. Third, I collect comic books. Fourth, I'm allergic to dust.

Hi participant_2! I'm participant_2, and I'm also an interesting person. First, I was the first test child for Sesame Street. Second, I once started a forest fire in California. Third, I speak six languages. Fourth, I always carry an edged weapon. Fifth, I work on the radio as a character voice.
Wow! You're a lot more interesting than I thought! I'm especially impressed that you speak six languages and that you're a character voice on the radio.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that. I'm pretty proud of those things myself.
So, what's your favorite language to speak?
I'd have to say English, because it's my first language and I'm most comfortable with it. But I also really enjoy speaking Spanish, because it's such a beautiful language.
I agree, Spanish is a beautiful language. I'm not very good at it, but I'm trying to learn.
That's great! It's a lot of fun to learn new languages.
So, what's it like working on the radio as a character voice?
It's really fun! I get to play all sorts of different characters, and it's always a challenge to come up with new and interesting ways to voice them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you're really good at it.
Well, it sounds like you're an amazing person. I'm really glad I met you today.
Thanks! I'm glad I met you too.
